documents.title: Birth Certificate — Robert Miller
documents.content:
COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA
BUREAU OF VITAL STATISTICS

CERTIFICATE OF BIRTH

Name: Robert James Miller
Date of Birth: March 15, 1925
Place of Birth: Pittsburgh, Allegheny County

Father: James Edward Miller
  Occupation: Steelworker
Mother: Helen Miller (née Smith)
  Occupation: Homemaker

Attending Physician: Dr. William Hayes

documents.title: Marriage Certificate — Robert Miller & Dorothy Webb
documents.content:
CERTIFICATE OF MARRIAGE

This certifies that on the 14th day of June, 1950,
Robert James Miller (age 25)
and
Dorothy Anne Webb (age 23)
were united in marriage at
First Presbyterian Church, Pittsburgh, PA.

Witnesses:
  James E. Miller (father of the groom)
  Margaret Miller (sister of the groom)

documents.title: Pittsburgh Gazette — Graduation Announcement
documents.content:
PITTSBURGH GAZETTE — June 12, 1948

LOCAL GRADUATES

Among this year's graduates of Carnegie Institute
of Technology, we are proud to recognize:

Margaret Louise Miller, daughter of James and
Helen Miller of Squirrel Hill, who graduated
with honors in Mathematics. Miss Miller, 21,
plans to pursue a teaching career.

documents.title: Radio Broadcast — Miller Steel Strike, 1937
documents.content: Transcript: "...and the workers at Miller Steel, led by union representative James E. Miller, have entered their third day of negotiations..."

documents.title: Home Movie — Miller Family Picnic, 1955
documents.content: Caption: Grainy 8mm footage shows the Miller family gathered at Schenley Park. Robert and Dorothy are seen with a young child.

documents.title: Photograph — Family Game Night, 1952
documents.content: A set of colorful dice on the table — the Millers were known for their weekly game nights.
